messages.message: I've been trying to get my Office software to work for the last hour! This is ridiculous!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Hannah. Can you please tell me what issues you're facing?
It keeps crashing! I need to get my work done, and this is unacceptable!
I understand how frustrating that can be. Let's see if we can troubleshoot the issue together.
I don't want to troubleshoot! I just want it to work! I've had enough of this poor service!
I'm sorry to hear that you're upset. I'm here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
It shouldn't be this hard! I just want a functional product that I paid for!
I completely understand your frustration. Let me pull up your account and see what we can do to fix it quickly.
